item.title: HUB3: Spicy fried chicken burger | Sprødstegt, krydret kylling i briochebolle med hjemmelavet relish, coleslaw, rødløg og vores egen specialsauce | Spicy fried bønne-burger i briochebolle med hjemmelavet relish, coleslaw, rødløg og vores egen specialsauce. | | -WEEK 37- | Monday | Mexican Birria with Beef Chuck from Himmerland | Slow-braised beef in a spiced birria sauce with potatoes and bell peppers, served with crispy nachos, fresh lime, sour cream, and a sprinkle of coriander. | Hearty Mexican birria with green beans, potatoes, and bell peppers, served with crispy nachos, fresh lime, sour cream, and a sprinkle of coriander. | Tuesday | Southern European Warm Potato Salad with Chicken | Warm potatoes tossed in parsley pesto, topped with juicy pieces of chicken breast, creamy feta, and a crunchy almond crumble – a light and delicious dish with Southern flair. | Southern European warm potato salad with green haricot verts, parsley pesto, feta, and almond crumble – fresh, colorful, and satisfying. | Wednesday | Orzo Pasta with Mushrooms and Mung Beans | Small pasta grains in a silky spinach and cream sauce, tossed with mushrooms and mung beans, and finished with butter – a creamy and satisfying dish. | Cake of the Day: Apple and rhubarb trifle with vanilla whipped cream. | Thursday | Lasagna with Tomato Salad | Classic lasagna with rich beef ragù and creamy béchamel, served with a fresh tomato salad featuring red onion, white beans, and basil. | Vegetable lasagna served with the same fresh tomato salad with red onion, white beans, and basil. | Friday | Spicy Fried Chicken Burger | Crispy, spiced fried chicken in a brioche bun with homemade relish, coleslaw, red onion, and our signature sauce. | Spicy fried bean burger in a brioche bun with homemade relish, coleslaw, red onion, and our signature sauce. | Vegetar: | Vegetarian:
